thread.title: BRIEF-Neuralstem Says At Dec. 31, 2017, Cash And Investments Was $11.7 Mln Compared To $20.2 Mln At Dec. 31, 2016

title: BRIEF-Neuralstem Says At Dec. 31, 2017, Cash And Investments Was $11.7 Mln Compared To $20.2 Mln At Dec. 31, 2016
text:
Market News April 2, 2018 / 11:49 AM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Neuralstem Says At Dec. 31, 2017, Cash And Investments Was $11.7 Mln Compared To $20.2 Mln At Dec. 31, 2016 Reuters Staff 
April 2 (Reuters) - Neuralstem Inc: 
* NEURALSTEM REPORTS YEAR END 2017 FISCAL RESULTS AND BUSINESS UPDATE 
* AT DECEMBER 31, 2017, CASH AND INVESTMENTS WAS $11.7 MILLION AS COMPARED TO $20.2 MILLION AT DECEMBER 31, 2016 
* TERM INVESTMENTS TO FUND OPERATIONS INTO Q2 OF 2019 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
